[Course] Kaiseki of the Month

sales_points.pr_long:
This Japanese restaurant is located inside a house quietly nestled down a side street of Minami-Aoyama. Why not come here to relax in one of their special private rooms and enjoy some sake with delicious Kaiseki cuisine (Japanese banquet cuisine ) made with seasonal ingredients?
The skilled chef lovingly prepares each and every one of the dishes for the "Kaiseki of the Month" courses, all made with carefully selected,  seasonal ingredients from all over the country.
[Particular about Rice] Only quality, brand rice is used

OSHIMA SHINJUKU is located on the 8F of the Odakyu HALC building (West Exit of Shinjuku Station, Tokyo)

sales_points.pr_long:
"Motsu(offal) simmered with tofu"
The fresh and less smell domestic offal is carefully-simmered for a long time with the tofu handmade at the restaurant.
Its plump texture with special soup makes you addicted.
"Charcoal-grilled skewers"
The meat cut at the restaurant is carefully skewered one by one and grilled slowly over a charcoal fire.
We have various kinds of creative food such as vegetables skewers and beef outside skirt skewers including chicken skewers and pork skewers.
We are eagerly waiting for your visit preparing delicious food with delicious alcoholic drinks.

sales_points.pr_long: In only 2 minutes from Hamamatsu-cho South exist S5, the landscape suddenly changes to that of a nostalgic old downtown. Looking from the cruising boat, the scenery of Tokyo will appear so different that this occasion will surely be a memorable one for you. During this time, you will be able to enjoy the magnificent view of Tokyo Tower, Rainbow Bridge, and Tokyo Skytree. Enjoy the great night view! Cruise through the old town of Edo.

Sushi Iwa has been perfecting the work of Sushi - preparing of ingredient, 
called Sushi Neta excellence in quality and hand-shaped sushi technique.
Our lunch menu is also popular.

access: Subway Hibiya Line Tsukiji Station 1-minute walk

name.name: hama Ginzaten
name.name_sub: ステーキハウス ハマ 銀座店

contacts.address: Dai-go pole star Building 7F, 7-6-12, Ginza, Chuo-ku, Tokyo, 104-0061

sales_points.pr_short: Please fully enjoy the well-established techniques that bring out the deliciousness of carefully-selected ingredients. Please avail our restaurant for such occasions as an important anniversary and special gatherings.
sales_points.pr_long:
We prepare especially "Matsusaka beef" and "Omi beef" among the fine selections of Kuroge Wagyu beef.
Our restaurant tries to serve beef that is managed in a very good condition.
In addition, we offer fresh seafood from the market in the fishing port every day.
We have a lot of seasonal ingredients and we cook it over the iron plate on the counter before your very eyes.
Please enjoy your fun time and atmosphere to your heart's content in private rooms or at counter seats that are suitable for entertaining business clients, dining-together and anniversaries, perfect for spending the elegant and luxurious time.

access: Subway Ginza Station 7-minute walk, JR Shimbashi Station 6-minute walk
